attributes.comment:
I am just writing in the hope that a small comment regarding the proposed rate
increase for processing citizenship and immigration paperwork. As an adoptive
mom to two young children, I can attest to the fact that it is an expensive thing to
adopt internationally. To provide children with a caring and loving family they
might otherwise not have does come with a price tag and often a very high one. I
would ask that these increases in rates be reconsidered, so that the door remains
open to families wishing to adopt internationally. There are many special needs
children whom without the prospect of being adopted internationally might have no
chance for a decent life. Many times those willing to adopt special needs children
have a heart of gold, but money is just sooo tight that they find funding the
adoption difficult to nearly impossible. The proposed increases just make it even
more difficult to find the funding for adoption to those who would open their hearts
to bringing children home who might not otherwise have a home at all.
Please reconsider the increase.
Thankyou for your time,
Carol Dymek
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Carol Dymek
